documents.document: @RachelBurnham What witch craft is this?! I need to do this!
@CarlPackman Not a load of Corbynites then?

No.9 for all the parents out there working in creative jobs - your kids are ACTUALLY helping you when they wake you up at two hours intervals through the night zzzzz #parenting #working #PR #marketing https://t.co/7iCsB3rWvN
@CarlPackman What is going on??
That would be a fun job! https://t.co/aVWczOIQkc
💯 not good enough. https://t.co/rlyQfZquUR
@BarclaysUKHelp Great job - thank you 😊
@markbeaumontcom Ah maybe their market share is too small.
@markbeaumontcom Hmmm VERY interesting - no @SebRocheLtd on there though?

@BarclaysUKHelp I’ve DM you now so you should have all info - I appreciate your help. More than I’ve had in four months of not taking to Twitter but calling most days and going into several branches. #twitterpower
@BarclaysUKHelp Thank you 🙏🏻
Thank you @GeorgieAgass I felt like I was going mad! https://t.co/BJSxNWawwE

@BarclaysUKHelp I’ve gone into branch - you’ve photocopied my marriage certificate, seen my passport. I’ve filled out a mandate change form. Posted it off. Now you want an old fashioned headed letter in the post about my registered company address. I give up.
@BarclaysUKHelp I have also been to the branch multiple times. You’re insisting I use the mandate change team, which is proving impossible.
@BarclaysUKHelp I don’t have headed paper like 90% of modern day businesses this is obsolete. Yet you’re insisting on this. Why can’t you accept an email? Actually much more secure.
Hands up - who still has ‘headed paper’ ? @Barclays believe it’s still a pre requisite to run an SME these days 🤦🏻‍♀️#entrepeneur #SME #business

It’s not just the #nhs that is living in the fax age. @Barclays 4m on still can’t change my maiden name. They insist I send a letter on headed paper. It’s 2018 not 1998. Get with the program. How can you claim to support modern businesses? #DigitalTransformation
@RJ_Macpherson @CarlPackman @bennettjonj @estwebber @ayestotheright @Annaisaac hope this can help?
@RJ_Macpherson @CarlPackman @bennettjonj @estwebber @ayestotheright Knew you’d know someone though!
@CarlPackman @bennettjonj @RJ_Macpherson https://t.co/VlKfLMJ5n8

@davidalmulligan @ruthcarnall Those people who I see thriving before / during and after their additional responsibility of a child or other know themselves and their boundaries so well. They revisit them regularly and communicate them clearly avoiding ‘overload’. #selfcare @BlurtAlerts are awesome 👏🏻

@davidalmulligan @ruthcarnall Taking on a massive new responsibility, kids or other, means you need to develop a much deeper self knowledge than before. If you don’t, you get harried by others expectations of you - which are v gendered. Then, that’s where break point comes.
